ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: I probably wouldn't recommend this class to another student unless they freakin love political philosophy and YPU-style philosophical discussions. The class was like a half normal people, and half people who whisper sweet nothings to their intimates about Kant in their free time. You can probably do better than this class. (Though, in fairness, this was it's first year, so it may be better next year.)
I would certainly recommend this class to fellow students.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It was a fantastic introduction to advanced topics in political theory. Will be very helpful for the qualifying exam.
The course gave me a solid background in political theory . It is above all intellectually stimulating but I know that the concepts will be useful when I take diplomatic competitions.
